doc.name: CompositeActorMatcher
doc.description: A matcher to match a level of hierarchy in a hierarchical model. In the pattern of a ptolemy.actor.gt.TransformationRule, this matcher can be customized by instances of ptolemy.actor.gt.ingredients.criteria.Criterion. A ptolemy.actor.gt.ingredients.criteria.PortCriterion, for instance, customizes this matcher with an additional port, whose type and name can be specified. In the replacement of a ptolemy.actor.gt.TransformationRule, operations can be specified for this matcher with instances of ptolemy.actor.gt.ingredients.operations.Operation. The operations will be performed on the actor that is matched by the corresponding matcher in the pattern, and is preserved after the transformation.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
